select * from board
where ${category} like '%'||#{search}||'%'
where btitle like '%'||#{search}||'%' or bcontent like '%'||#{search}||'%'
order by bgroup desc,bstep asc
select * from board where bno = (select prev_no from ( select bno,lead(bno,1,-1) over(order by bgroup desc,bstep asc) prev_no from board) where bno=#{bno})
select * from board where bno = (select next_no from ( select bno,lag(bno,1,-1) over(order by bgroup desc,bstep asc) next_no from board) where bno=#{bno})
mapper.update: update board set bhit = bhit+1 where bno=#{bno}
update board set bstep = bstep+1 where bgroup=#{bgroup} and bstep>#{bstep}
